audioText: Sa confiance en elle-même s'est renforcée grâce aux encouragements de ses collègues durant ce projet difficile.
question: How did her self-confidence develop during this difficult project?
options: It strengthened thanks to her colleagues' encouragement
It decreased due to constant criticism
It remained unchanged throughout the project
It improved only after the project ended
explanation: The text states 'Sa confiance en elle-même s'est renforcée grâce aux encouragements de ses collègues durant ce projet difficile' - Her self-confidence strengthened thanks to her colleagues' encouragement during this difficult project. 'Confiance' means confidence, and 'se renforcer' means to strengthen or grow stronger.
source: Strategic noun coverage + workplace psychology context
